goal: Create a simple greeting skill that demonstrates the V2 structure
acceptance_criteria: Skill can generate a greeting message
Output format is consistent and correct

features.name: Basic Greeting
features.test_scenario: Given a name 'Alice', When the skill is invoked, Then output 'Hello, Alice!'

features.name: Greeting with Time of Day
features.test_scenario: Given a name 'Bob' and current time is morning, When skill is invoked with time option, Then output 'Good morning, Bob!'
features.expected_result: Console displays greeting with appropriate time of day prefix

features.name: Custom Message
features.test_scenario: Given a name 'Charlie' and custom message 'Welcome', When skill is invoked with custom flag, Then output 'Welcome, Charlie!'
features.expected_result: Console displays custom message with name
